tasks.install: deno task install:base --frozen-lockfile & deno task install:client --frozen-lockfile
tasks.install:force: deno task install:base & deno task install:client
tasks.start: deno task start:client & deno task start:server
tasks.build: deno task build:client & deno task build:server
tasks.build:client: cd app/client && yarn build; cd $INIT_CWD && deno task writeContributors:client
